examples.text: Osmanlı meclisi meb'usanının son reisi Celâlettin Arif bey 1929 senesinde Pariste bir otelde ölmüştu.
examples.translation: The Ottoman parliament's last leader Celâlettin Arif Bey died in 1929 in a Paris hotel.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish مبعوثان (mebusan), plural of Arabic مَبْعُوث (mabʕūṯ).
